items.content_html: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.
items.title: bayethelungah/Tode-Server: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.

items.content_html: A lightweight web app for you to find, create and share your top 10 lists of the year.
items.title: tbrown034/end-of-year-list-maker: A lightweight web app for you to find, create and share your top 10 lists of the year.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
items.title: orchidjs/tom-select: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: Angular Drag Drop Layout is a lightweight, dependency-free Angular library for creating highly customizable, responsive grid layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. Built with Angular 18 and utilizing Angular Signals, this library provides a seamless and optimized experience for building dynamic and interactive layouts.
items.title: skutam/angular-drag-drop-layout: Angular Drag Drop Layout is a lightweight, dependency-free Angular library for creating highly customizable, responsive grid layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. Built with Angular 18 and utilizing Angular Signals, this library provides a seamless and optimized experience for building dynamic and interactive layouts.
